name: ASUS TUF Gaming A17 FA706IC-HX036W AMD Ryzen 7

prod_desc.heading: Why buy Asus TUF Gaming A17 (90NR0675-M002F0) Ryzen 7 Windows 11 Home Laptop
features: 512GB SSD to store all your files
Windows 11 Home 64 operating system for user-friendly performance
17.3-Inch Full HD Display to get the ultimate visuals
8 GB DDR4-4800H MHz RAM for smooth using experience
AMD Ryzen 7 Octa-Core Processor for fast performance
sub_features: Boost up your computing experience as the Asus TUF Gaming A17 (90NR0675-M002F0) Ryzen 7 Windows 11 Home Laptop features the latest advancements delivering efficient performance. Loaded with Windows 11 Home 64 operating system helps you perform user-friendly operations. Witness the super-smooth operation with the AMD Ryzen 7 Octa-Core processor that takes your performance to a whole new level. It never lets you slow down in terms of efficiency so that the quality and quantity of your work are never hampered. Equipped with one of the best-in-class graphical performances, this laptop is all ready to step up your computing experience.

Enjoy super-fast speed as soon as you buy Asus TUF Gaming A17 (90NR0675-M002F0) Ryzen 7 Windows 11 Home Laptop. This laptop has a huge storage capacity of 512GB SSD to make it more efficient and productive, letting you store your games within this laptop. It is equipped with NVIDIA GeForce RTX RTX 3050 Graphics which gives a delightful gaming feel. Experience the speedy performance with advanced specifications, this laptop is one of the best laptops available in the market. Having 8 GB DDR4-4800H MHz RAM, you can revel in powerful performance without interrupting your entertainment.

Stay in sync with the advanced technology by bringing home the Asus TUF Gaming A17 (90NR0675-M002F0) Ryzen 7 Windows 11 Home Laptop online. It has a 17.3-inch FHD display that allows you to enjoy watching videos and playing games with full clarity. This laptop is a perfect choice for modern tech-oriented people. Escape the toneless routine and immerse yourself in the action with built-in dual speakers. Amplify your experience with rich sound and hear every detail with crystal clear audio quality to take your entertainment to another level. So, go ahead and order the Asus TUF Gaming A17 (90NR0675-M002F0) Ryzen 7 Windows 11 Home Laptop  online, right now!

faqs.que: What is the average life of a ASUS laptop?
faqs.ans: Maintaining good habits can extend your laptop's longevity. Many users buy a laptop every couple of years (average laptop lifespan is 3–5 years)

faqs.que: How long is ASUS battery last?
faqs.ans: Under normal usage conditions and in ambient temperatures (25℃), the Li-ion battery is expected to discharge and recharge normally for 300 cycles (or about one year).

Your computer may overheat because of insufficient air flow due to dust, hair, or debris blocking the air vents. If you experience the issues of the fan is not working, the fan speed is always fast, or the fan noise is obvious loudly, please refer to the troubleshooting in this article
It isn't possible to overcharge a laptop battery. Leaving your computer plugged in after it is fully charged doesn't overcharge or damage the battery.
